page.title: 17HOUSING SYDMONTON AREA
page.content: THERE ARE THREE FARMHOUSES, BUT ONLY ONE IS A WORKING FARM, SYDMONTON FARM. THE HOUSE IS 18th CENTURY. IT HAS NOT BEEN ALTERED RECENTLY. NUTHANGER IS A VERY OLD BUILDING AND MUST HAVE BEEN ALTERED MANY TIMES. IT CONTAINS A WELL ROOM. NO ALTERATIONS HAVE BEEN MADE TO THE OUTSIDE RECENTLY. WATERSHIP HAS LONG BEEN A PRIVATE HOUSE. THE MAIN FRONT LOOKS VICTORIAN. THE COTTAGES HAVE ALL BELONGED TO SYDMONTON ESTATE BUT SEVERAL ARE NOW OWNER OCCUPIED AND HAVE RECENT EXTENSIONS AND IMPROVEMENTS LIKE BATHROOMS AND ELECTRICITY. SYDMONTON COURT IS PROBABLY 16th CENTURY AND HAD BEEN IN THE SAME FAMILY FOR SEVERAL GENERATIONS UNTIL THE LAST DECADE WHEN IT WAS SOLD SEPARATELY FROM THE ESTATE.THE STABLE BLOCK IS NOW A HOUSE
